job.title: Help Desk Technician
job.description:
Our Client, a national healthcare company is looking for people with outstandingphone/communication skills to work as part of their new digital support teamthat will assist phlebotomists with any IT issues. You willtroubleshoot Level 1 over the phone andoccasionallyin person as part of a 24x7 call center.There could be some local travel. You must be a US citizen and be able to pass a background check and drug test.

Must haves:

  • Great Customer Service
  • Level 1 tech skills
  • Wants to grow in tech
  • Able to remotely troubleshoot issues
  • Possible travelupto25% somust have a vehicle
  • Remote and Nationwide
  • Windows 7 and Windows 10 install and troubleshooting
  • Familiarity with help desk ticketing systems
  • Familiarity with Active Directory and VPN big +
  • Network printer installation and configuration
  • Network printer installation and configuration
